author: ebourg
msg: ConfigurationUtils.locate() now checks if the URL based ressources exist.

author: ebourg
msg: The constructor AbstractFileConfiguration(String) now relies on setFileName() instead of duplicating the logic.
This provides an alternate fix to Bug 32236 with a modification to ConfigurationUtils.getBasePath.

author: ebourg
msg: getBasePath now returns null if the specified URL is null

author: oheger
msg: Added support for optional configurations in configuration definition files for ConfigurationFactory.
